page.title: 18ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: We asked people of different ages what they thought of entertainment in the area.Most thought there was plenty to do and many places outside the area which are easy to reach,including London.In the area there are Play Groups,Brownies,Guides,Cubs,Scouts, Youth club,Squash,Cricket,Football, horse riding,BMX track,aerobics, gymnastics, fishing,boating, dancing, library,cinema,theatre, Bingo and pubs. Chalvey and Upton have the fewest facilities. We visited the Theatre Royal in Windsor Famous actors in popular plays perform there.The theatre puts on 14/ 15 productions a year and can seat 600 people.We saw the workshops where the scenery is made,the dressmakers room where there were hundreds of hats and dresses,the computer controlled stage lights and the dressing rooms.
